Sequence Information.Peptide Name: ARD1 (UCSS1a; 3S=S, natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Crucial residues: The highly exposed alpha-patch for anti-fungal activity.

Literature Information.Literature: Although ARD1 differs from heliomicin (AP00031) by only two residues (N17D and A20G), it was found to be more active against the human pathogens A. fumigatus and C. albicans.You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB. Updated 2/2014.
Literature Information.Author: Landon, C.,  Guenneugues, M.,  Barbault, F.,  Legrain, M.,  Menin, L.,  Schott, V.,  Vovelle, F.,  Dimarcq, J.L. 2004
Literature Information.Title: NMR structure of antifungal defensin ARD1 from Archaeoprepona demophon
